content: CF 116 insulating foam sealant Re-usable nozzle foam ideal for sealing, filling and insulating gaps and cracks ### Categories: Home > Products > Construction chemicals > Foams- - - ### FEATURES:Features Reusable system allows user to dispense contents of can after several hours or days Helps to prevent drafts – contributing to a reduction in heating/cooling expenses High-yield formulation Applications Gaps and cracks Pipe penetrations Drywall voids Electrical voids Backfilling for sealants ### TECHNICAL DATA: Foam Yield (up to): 0.8 ft³ Approx. tack free time (at 74°F / 50% rel. humidity): 8 min Approx. cut time (at 23°C / 50% rel. Humidity): 30 min Technical Data | Foam Yield (up to) | 0.8 ft³ | Approx. tack free time (at 74°F / 50% rel. humidity) | 8 min | Approx. cut time (at 23°C / 50% rel. Humidity) | 30 min | Color | Manila | Temperature resistance range | -22 - 176 °F | Application temperature range | 41 - 95 °F | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 321423 - Reusable nozzle foam CF 116 - Package Size 1 pc - 3449060 - Reusable nozzle foam CF 116 12 pk - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 12x Reusable nozzle foam CF 116 - 3449061 - Reusable nozzle foam CF 116 3 cases - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 36x Reusable nozzle foam CF 116 - 3449062 - Reusable nozzle foam CF 116 9 cases - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 108x Reusable nozzle foam CF 116 - 3449123 - Reusable nozzle foam CF 116 18 cases - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 216x Reusable nozzle foam CF 116
